items.name: var instanceID: TKToken.InstanceID
items.desc: The unique, persistent identifier of this token that the token implementation creates.

items.name: var configurationData: Data?
items.desc: Additional configuration information for the token instance.

items.name: var keychainItems: [TKTokenKeychainItem]
items.desc: The keychain items associated with this token.

items.name: func certificate(for: TKToken.ObjectID) -> TKTokenKeychainCertificate
items.desc: Returns a certificate from the keychain with the object identifier you specify.

items.name: func key(for: TKToken.ObjectID) -> TKTokenKeychainKey
items.desc: Returns a key from the keychain with the object identifier you specify.
